title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5902.6 - Prohibition of contingent payments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5902.6 - Prohibition of contingent payments

State Regulations

An applicant shall execute an affidavit stating that
applicant has not and will not enter into any agreement, expressed or implied, providing for the payment of money or any other consideration for professional
or other services in the nature of a brokerage commission or finder's fee which
is dependent upon or contingent upon the approval of an award of financial
assistance from the foundation. The affidavit provided for herein shall be
filed with the foundation prior to the closing of any agreement for financial
assistance with the foundation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21

5902.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
